Text: Thank you so much for this. I really appreciate your work. I have been looking for some halos for years and now I have them all. nAnd the complete recordings of The Fragile are superb! nTHANK YOU SO MUCH!

Hi, Your Torrent Is pretty amazing, I've been searching for all of those other halos for years without luck, and now you've uploaded them all, but its a shame that nobody seeds this masterpiece ever, and I can't download it.
Oh by the way, I noticed you don't have Purest Feeling 2, I own it, if you want it just speak and i will upload it, so you can have an ever nicer torrrent!

Wow. Very impressed with the quality and the work you put into this, thank you very much.

@ metroidian
To the best of my knowledge, there are no good copies of supernaut to be had.
I must have grabbed about 15 copies over the years, some even on the venerable cassette tape, and every single one was that same poor-quality recording that I'm sure you've played for a thousand years...
I think even the original was a poor dub of a one-off session recording, and it's all we're getting.

judging from the upload date, i'm guessing Pretty Hate Machine is not the 2010 remaster... bummer.
